name: The No Man's Zone in Desert IV and the Pyramid
name_original: The No Man's Zone in Desert IV and the Pyramid
description: This is an adventure story that people are trying to go through the no-man zone in “Desert IV”. J will be the main character and J is a photographer. J arrived at the Desert IV town, and get a lot of information there. J decided to go to the no-man zone to take some wonderful photos. While J is crossing the no-man zone, J meets some challenges. J has to make selections in each event, and only one choice is right that can help J to get through.
